PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-00812017-02-03ECCC,  HC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Export of Substances on the Export Control List Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EXPORT OF SUBSTANCES ON THE EXPORT CONTROL LIST REGULATIONS in order to make the following changes to (1) the conditions Relative to the Minamata Convention; (2) the prior Notice of Export; (3) the conditions Relative to the Rotterdam Convention; and (4) address comments by the Standing Committee on the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0011 Publication Date: 2017-02-22
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Export of Substances on the Export Control List Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the EXPORT OF SUBSTANCES ON THE EXPORT CONTROL LIST REGULATIONS in order to make the following changes to (1) the conditions Relative to the Minamata Convention; (2) the prior Notice of Export; (3) the conditions Relative to the Rotterdam Convention; and (4) address comments by the Standing Committee on the Scrutiny of Regulations.
